item.description: We've seen the benefits of open science. A new report shows that Covid19 papers were published faster, were OA, but open data & preprinting remained stubbornly low.. item.description: The important thing here is that the historical data is needed to properly understand the context of new ICU admissions. Data should ideally be provided daily though the province's Open Data team, @ONDigital, the same way the less useful ICU inventory is provided.

item.title: #en @ 1467777925583831044
item.description:
We all benefit from #opendata.
Even #opendata takes effort & money to produce.
The fact that it then goes on to benefit *all of us* doesn't mean it's worth less: it means we should invest more in producing #opendata /because/ it takes money & effort - and benefits us all! https://t.co/zGyPs4nzR4
